content: I’m not even sure why I’m messaging you all again. Last time you sent someone out, they were hours late and never fixed the leak. This better not be another waste of my time.

Hello, I’m so sorry to hear about your previous experience. We want to make sure this time goes smoothly and your needs are taken care of. Can I please have your name so I can get started with your booking and make sure we get everything right today?
It’s Mike. Seriously, you all need to get your act together. This is my last try with XYZ.
Thank you, Mike. We appreciate you giving us another chance and I’ll do my best to make sure things go right. Could I have your address, please, so we can confirm your location for the plumbing job?
530 Sonora Lane. And don’t even think about charging me for the last visit. I want a good deal for this job.
Thank you, Mike! I have your address at 530 Sonora Lane. Could you quickly describe the plumbing issue you need help with today? I’ll also check if we have any discounts available for you.
There’s still a slow drip under the kitchen sink. It’s been getting worse. Last guy said it was fixed but obviously not.

Thank you for the details, Mike. I apologize for that not being resolved before. What is your preferred date and time for us to come by and fully fix the leak? We’ll do our best to prioritize your appointment.
Tomorrow morning between 8 and 10, and it better not be later than that.
Thank you, Mike. Let me check our calendar for availability between 8 and 10 am tomorrow. I’ll make sure to reserve your spot if possible.
Good news! We have a slot available between 8 and 10 am tomorrow. Would you like me to book this appointment for you now?
Book it. How much is this going to cost me, by the way? I really don’t want another surprise.
I’ll book your 8–10 am appointment for tomorrow and will get you a price estimate for the kitchen sink leak so you know what to expect. One moment, please.

Your appointment is confirmed for tomorrow between 8 and 10 am. The estimated cost for fixing a slow drip under the kitchen sink is typically between $80 and $150, depending on the exact issue. If anything changes, we’ll contact you before doing any additional work. Thank you for choosing XYZ again, Mike — we will make this right!
